Title: Heart-and-soul
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: The young woman carries a karge bag and supportss an elderly woman, the little boy carries a red lantern and leads the way. In his pocket are some booklets, the front one titled "The Story of Lei Feng" (雷锋的故事). In this way it is made obvious that the poster promotes "the Lei Feng Spirit".
